verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>"Command<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that they <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%> from the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6879>leper<s%> and <S%H3605>everyone<s%> having a <S%H2100>discharge<s%> and <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> because of a [dead] <S%H5315>person.<s%>

"You shall <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H4480>both<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female;<s%> you shall <S%H7971>send<s%> them <S%H413>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> so that they will not <S%H2930>defile<s%> their <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> I <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst.<s%>"

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H413>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did.<s%>
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>'When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the <S%H9128>sins<s%> of <S%H120>mankind,<s%> <S%H4603>acting<s%> <S%H4604>unfaithfully<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and that <S%H5315>person<s%> is <S%H816>guilty,<s%>

then he shall <S%H3034>confess<s%> his <S%H9128>sins<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6213>committed,<s%> and he shall <S%H7725>make<s%> <S%H7725>restitution<s%> in <S%H7218>full<s%> for his <S%H817>wrong,<s%> and <S%H3254>add<s%> to it one-fifth of it, and <S%H5414>give<s%> [it] to him <S%H834>whom<s%> he has <S%H816>wronged.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1350>relative<s%> to whom <S%H7725>restitution<s%> may be <S%H7725>made<s%> for the <S%H817>wrong,<s%> the <S%H7725>restitution<s%> which is <S%H7725>made<s%> for the <S%H817>wrong<s%> [must go] to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H9012>ram<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement,<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> is <S%H3722>made<s%> for him.

'Also <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8641>contribution<s%> pertaining to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gifts] of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7126>offer<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> shall be his.
'So <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gifts] shall be his; <S%H834>whatever<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> man <S%H5414>gives<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> it <S%H1961>becomes<s%> his.' "
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>'If<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> man's <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H7847>goes<s%> <S%H7847>astray<s%> and is <S%H4604>unfaithful<s%> to him,

and a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>has<s%> <S%H2233>intercourse<s%> <S%H7902><s%> with her and it is <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of her <S%H376>husband<s%> and she is <S%H5641>undetected,<s%> although she has <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H1931>herself,<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against her and she has not been <S%H8610>caught<s%> in the act,

if a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>comes<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him and he is <S%H7065>jealous<s%> of his <S%H802>wife<s%> when she has <S%H2930>defiled<s%> herself, <S%H176>or<s%> if a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>comes<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him and he is <S%H7065>jealous<s%> of his <S%H802>wife<s%> when she has not <S%H2930>defiled<s%> herself,

the <S%H376>man<s%> shall then <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and shall <S%H935>bring<s%> [as] an <S%H7133>offering<s%> for her one-tenth of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H7058>meal;<s%> he shall not <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on it, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> on it, for it is a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial,<s%> a <S%H2142>reminder<s%> of <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
'Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> her <S%H7126>near<s%> and have her <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in an <S%H2789>earthenware<s%> <S%H3627>vessel;<s%> and he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> that is on the <S%H7172>floor<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> [it] into the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

'The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall then have the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H6544>let<s%> [the hair of] the woman's <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H6544>go<s%> <S%H6544>loose,<s%> and <S%H5414>place<s%> the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in her <S%H3709>hands,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> and in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest<s%> is to be the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> that <S%H779>brings<s%> a <S%H779>curse.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall have her <S%H7650>take<s%> an <S%H7650>oath<s%> and shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H7901>lain<s%> with you and <S%H518>if<s%> you have not <S%H7847>gone<s%> <S%H7847>astray<s%> into <S%H2932>uncleanness,<s%> [being] <S%H8478>under<s%> [the authority of] your <S%H376>husband,<s%> be <S%H5352>immune<s%> to <S%H428>this<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> that <S%H779>brings<s%> a <S%H779>curse;<s%>

<S%H3588>if<s%> you, however, have <S%H7847>gone<s%> <S%H7847>astray,<s%> [being] <S%H8478>under<s%> [the authority of] your <S%H376>husband,<s%> and <S%H3588>if<s%> you have <S%H2930>defiled<s%> yourself and a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1107>other<s%> <S%H1107>than<s%> your <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H5414>has<s%> <S%H5414>had<s%> <S%H7903>intercourse<s%> with you "

(then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall have the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7650>swear<s%> with the <S%H7621>oath<s%> of the <S%H423>curse,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H802>woman<s%>), "the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H423>curse<s%> and an <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> by the Lord's <S%H5414>making<s%> your <S%H3409>thigh<s%> <S%H5307>waste<s%> <S%H5307>away<s%> and your <S%H990>abdomen<s%> <S%H6639>swell;<s%>

and <S%H428>this<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> that <S%H779>brings<s%> a <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> into your <S%H4578>stomach,<s%> and make your <S%H990>abdomen<s%> <S%H6638>swell<s%> and your <S%H3409>thigh<s%> <S%H5307>waste<s%> <S%H5307>away.<s%> "And the <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>"Amen.<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>"

'The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall then <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H423>curses<s%> on a <S%H5612>scroll,<s%> and he shall <S%H4229>wash<s%> them <S%H4229>off<s%> into the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4751>bitterness.<s%>

'Then he shall make the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> that <S%H779>brings<s%> a <S%H779>curse,<s%> so that the <S%H4325>water<s%> which <S%H779>brings<s%> a <S%H779>curse<s%> will <S%H935>go<s%> into her and [cause] <S%H4751>bitterness.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> from the woman's <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and he shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H7126>bring<s%> it to the <S%H4196>altar;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7061>take<s%> a <S%H7061>handful<s%> of the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> as its <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H234>offering<s%> and <S%H6999>offer<s%> [it] up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall make the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

'When he has made her <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water,<s%> then it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about, <S%H518>if<s%> she has <S%H2930>defiled<s%> herself and has <S%H4603>been<s%> <S%H4604>unfaithful<s%> to her <S%H376>husband,<s%> that the <S%H4325>water<s%> which <S%H779>brings<s%> a <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> into her and [cause] <S%H4751>bitterness,<s%> and her <S%H990>abdomen<s%> will <S%H6638>swell<s%> and her <S%H3409>thigh<s%> will <S%H5307>waste<s%> <S%H5307>away,<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H423>curse<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> her <S%H5971>people.<s%>
'But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> has not <S%H2930>defiled<s%> herself and is <S%H2889>clean,<s%> she will then be <S%H5352>free<s%> and <S%H2232>conceive<s%> <S%H2233>children.<s%>

<S%H2088>'This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy:<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> [being] <S%H8478>under<s%> [the authority of] her <S%H376>husband,<s%> <S%H7847>goes<s%> <S%H7847>astray<s%> and <S%H2930>defiles<s%> herself,

<S%H176>or<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>comes<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> and he is <S%H7065>jealous<s%> of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> he shall then make the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>apply<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> to her.
'Moreover, the <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H5352>free<s%> from <S%H5771>guilt,<s%> but that <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> her <S%H5771>guilt.<s%>' "
